function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extensive use of paper signs for conveying COVID-19 information","Impact":"Increased risk of physical contact and contamination through paper exchanging hands","Mitigation":"Use digital communication methods to convey information","Technologies":"Digital signage, mobile apps, email communication","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to the business","Owner":"Business owners and management"},{"Description":"Limited time to conduct research study involving interviews","Impact":"Missed opportunity to gather valuable insights and feedback from customers and retailers","Mitigation":"Utilize alternative research methods such as surveys or data analysis","Technologies":"Online surveys, data analytics tools","People":"Researchers, retailers, and customers","Owner":"Research organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Use of informal signs may lead to incomplete or unclear communication","Impact":"Confusion and misunderstanding of COVID-19 guidelines among customers and employees","Mitigation":"Implement standardized, professionally produced and branded signage","Technologies":"Graphic design software, printing technology","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to the business","Owner":"Business owners and management"}]}
